content.rendered:
Look and feel your best at Blink Beauty!

We provide world-class aesthetic procedures to help women (and men) bring out the best versions of themselves.
Book Your procedure

Welcome to Blink

At Blink Beauty we believe that everyone deserves to look and feel great! We provide a range of procedures to help busy women and men transform their appearance in rapid time. 

Our aestheticians are all highly skilled and carry internationally recognized certifications. Client care is at the heart of Blink Beauty , and we cannot wait to make you feel special!

learn More about blink
Book Your procedure

Why choose Blink Beauty?

With so many options available, why choose Blink? We're glad you asked!
  • Over 100 five star reviews
  • Stunning, state of the art facilities
  • Highly trained aestheticians
  • World class procedures
  • International qualifications
  • Convenciently located in Sea Point
Book Your procedure

World class permanent makeup and aesthetic procedures

All procedures are administered by highly trained therapists and conducted in stunning facilities with state of the art equipment.
More Details

Microblading

How to get perfect eyebrows without being a makeup artist
More Details

Powder Ombre Brows

Get beautiful, natural-looking eyebrows that will last for months with powder brows
More Details

Permanent Eyeliner

Get that perfect cat eye every day per permanent eyeliner
More Details

Permanent Lip Blushing

Get your lips looking amazing 24/7 without applying lipstick
More Details

Medical Tattooing

Get rid of scars & stretch marks, reduce the appearance of hair loss, restore nipples after surgery
More Details

Lash Extensions

No more mascara - get beautiful eyelashes with extensions!
More Details

Laser Hair Removal

Get rid of unwanted hair today with Laser Hair Removal!
More Details

Microneedling

Get your youth back with our noninvasive Microneedling procedure
More Details

Plasma Pen

Say Goodbye to Wrinkles, Fine Lines, and Sagging Skin with the Plasma Pen
Book Your procedure
Testimonials

Five star reviews

 5/5
I had a wonderful relaxing time, having my permanent brows and eyeliner done for the very first time, at age 70! Candy put me at ease, advised me of the options and was a pleasure to be with. I felt I had been to a rejuvenating spa, and the result is smashing. Now I just need a little hair tint as well, and I'll be A for Away!
Helen Zille
 5/5

“She made me feel completely at ease“

Candy was extremely professional both with the on-line consultation and the actual process. She made me feel completely at ease, explaining each step as we progressed through the design to the end result. I did not want to walk out with an extreme change to my brows, it needed to be subtle and she did that perfectly. Thank you Candy.
Pamela Carthew
 5/5

“Thank you Candy“

It was my first time yesterday doing permanent makeup and I’m so glad to have done it with Candy. She talked me through the whole process, calmed me coz I was so nervous. And the end result was just so perfect. I love my brows and thank you Candy for the magical transformation.
Miranda Mugandane
 5/5

“Wonderful and relaxed treatment“

Candy!
I can be very babyish about pain and you made it feel like a dream, I actually liked the tickle feeling on my eyes ! I would definitely recommend you to anyone who would like to do their eyeliner, brows and lips. You are amazing and made me feel so pretty. Definitely the best of the best and a wonderful and relaxed treatment and atmosphere!
Micia Smit
 5/5

“I never felt so cared for and special“

From the quick time it takes for Candy to respond to the messages, the lovely lady that sits in reception area at Seapoint office, the painless procedure, and the calming music in the background. Wow!!! I never felt so cared for and special. You guys are amazing. I love my powder brows a lot. There’s a saying that says “ you can forget what people said or did to you but you can never forget how they made you feel’.
Vuyo Mantyi Booi
 5/5

“I Absolutely would recommend Candy“

All I can say is WOW! I Absolutely would recommend Candy or anyone she appoints to do your permanent makeup. From the moment I got to the studio I felt at home. Such an amazing environment, the service is outstanding and the actual process of my brows was perfect. I love my brows and I can't wait to go back for my touch-up. 5 stars all the way!
Nadia Jordaan
 5/5

“Feeling beautiful and confident“

I am so thrilled with my permanent make up - and I am so happy with the experience I had with Candy! I would recommend Candy to absolutely anybody who is considering permanent make up! From start to finish Candy made sure I was at ease and comfortable. Not only is her studio absolutely beautiful, but her knowledge of the procedures she offers is phenomenal. She answered all the questions I had, and I left the procedure feeling beautiful and confident. New brows and eyeliner for a new year (& at least the next 3-5 years 😉)
Charlie Corkill
Book Your procedure
